Trump's longtime assistant and a bank executive testified in his hush money trial. A federal judge rejected Trump's request for a new trial in the $83.3 million E. Jean Carroll defamation case. Trump met with former Japanese prime minister Taro Aso. Trump's defense lawyers are vacillating between honorifics for him in the trial.
